bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from Harry A. Davis to Philip Showalter Hench, November 22, 1941

div1.p: Davis thanks Hench for the reprint of his article, “Conquerors of Yellow Fever.”

div1.head: Letter from Harry A. Davis to Philip Showalter Hench, November 22, 1941
div1.opener:
WAR DEPARTMENT
ARMY MEDICAL MUSEUM
7TH ST. AND INDEPENDENCE AVE. SW.
WASHINGTON
22 Nov. 1941
Dr. Philip S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minn.
Dear Dr. Hench:-
div1.p:
The reprint of Yellow Fever Conquerors came
safely to hand and I wish to thank you very much for remembering
me. This article undoubtedly contains data that has never before
been published and is an addition to our collection on Walter Reed.
div1.closer:
Sincerely, Harry A. Davis
Maj. USA Ret.
Hist Sect. ALL COMMUNICATIONS SHOULD BE ADDRESSED TO “CURATOR, ARMY MEDICAL MUSEUM, WASHINGTON, D. C.”
